# DUST WAVE Shop

> DUST WAVE is a creative collective based in Albuquerque, NM. This is the official online shop for DUST WAVE merchandise and event tickets, powered by Snipcart.

- The shop is located at [https://shop.dustwave.xyz](https://shop.dustwave.xyz)
- DUST WAVE's main site is at [https://dustwave.xyz](https://dustwave.xyz)
- Follow on Instagram: [@waveofdust](https://instagram.com/waveofdust)

## Products

{% endfor %}
